data.name: property_list_swipe
data.marketing: Shows the property list as a swipe-able row of property images. Bootstrap 2 & 3 only, not Bootstrap 5.
data.description: Shows the property list as a swipe-able row of property images. This plugin is optimised for full width pages (i.e. no sidebars) if you'd like to change the size of the area (e.g. for different template's component areas or because you have different size thumbnail sizes you can edit idangerous.swiper.css. You will need to edit the .swiper-container, .swiper-slide definitions.
data.change_log: v1.1 modified to ensure js and css files are only included if needed. v1.2 Improved functionality to resolve some javascript errors. v1.3 Improved some paths to js files. v1.4 PHP7 related maintenance. v1.5 Jomres 9.7.4 related changes v1.6 Remaining globals cleanup and jr_gettext refactor related changes. v1.7 Refactored to work with current version of Jomres. v1.8 French language file added v1.9 BS4 template set added v2.0 Language files updated v2.1 Bootstrap 5 template set added. v2.2 Not relevant to BS5 based systems.
data.author: Vince Wooll
